properties.description: USe sp_describe_first_result_set to describe table columns.

content.query:
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@sasynapsejgo.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) AS [result]'
